citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
There is an old coyote on exhibit with a yellowish ocular discharge on both eyes.
The attending veterinarian has not examined the coyote to diagnose and treat the condition.
Exhibitors shall establish and maintain programs of adequate veterinary care that include appropriate methods to
prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and medical conditions.
To be corrected by 10-7-2015.
An exit interview was conducted with the facility representative.
